title.en: Biographies of Bian Que and the Duke of Cang
title.raw: 《扁鵲倉公列傳》 Biographies of Bian Que and the Duke of Cang

sentences.zh: 扁鵲者，勃海郡鄭人也，姓秦氏，名越人。

translations.literal: Bian Que was from Zheng in Bohai commandery, surname Qin, given name Yue Ren.

sentences.zh: 少時為人舍長。

translations.literal: In his youth he served as a lodging house manager.

sentences.zh: 舍客長桑君過，扁鵲獨奇之，常謹遇之。

translations.literal: A guest at the lodging, Elder Sang, passed through. Bian Que alone found him extraordinary and constantly treated him with respect.

sentences.zh: 長桑君亦知扁鵲非常人也。

translations.literal: Elder Sang also knew Bian Que was no ordinary person.

sentences.zh: 出入十餘年，乃呼扁鵲私坐，閒與語曰：「我有禁方，年老，欲傳與公，公毋泄。」

translations.literal: Enter exit ten remain years, then call Bian Que private sit, leisure with speak said: "I have forbidden recipe, year old, desire transmit with gong, gong not leak."
translations.idiomatic: After coming and going for over ten years, he called Bian Que to sit privately, and casually said to him: "I have secret prescriptions. I am old and wish to pass them to you, do not leak them."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「敬諾。」

translations.literal: Bian Que said: "Respectful promise."
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "I respectfully accept."

sentences.zh: 乃出其懷中藥予扁鵲：「飲是以上池之水，三十日當知物矣。」

translations.literal: Then exit his bosom middle medicine give Bian Que: "Drink this with shang pool water, thirty days should know things."
translations.idiomatic: Then he took medicine from his bosom and gave it to Bian Que: "Drink this with water from an upper pond, after thirty days you will perceive things."

sentences.zh: 乃悉取其禁方書盡與扁鵲。

translations.literal: Then he took all his secret prescription books and gave them all to Bian Que.

sentences.zh: 忽然不見，殆非人也。

translations.literal: He suddenly disappeared, probably not a mortal.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲以其言飲藥三十日，視見垣一方人。

translations.literal: Bian Que followed his words and drank the medicine for thirty days, then could see through walls to the people on the other side.

sentences.zh: 以此視病，盡見五藏癥結，特以診脈為名耳。

translations.literal: Using this to examine illnesses, he could see all the blockages in the five viscera, but used pulse diagnosis as his official name.

sentences.zh: 為醫或在齊，或在趙。

translations.literal: As a physician he practiced either in Qi or in Zhao.

sentences.zh: 在趙者名扁鵲。

translations.literal: In Zhao he was called Bian Que.

sentences.zh: 當晉昭公時，諸大夫彊而公族弱，趙簡子為大夫，專國事。

translations.literal: During the time of Duke Zhao of Jin, the various ministers were strong while the ducal clan was weak. Zhao Jianzi served as minister and monopolized state affairs.

sentences.zh: 簡子疾，五日不知人，大夫皆懼，於是召扁鵲。

translations.literal: Jianzi fell ill, for five days unconscious. All the ministers were afraid, so they summoned Bian Que.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲入視病，出，董安于問扁鵲，扁鵲曰：「血脈治也，而何怪！

translations.literal: Bian Que enter view illness, exit, Dong An Yu ask Bian Que, Bian Que said: "Blood vessels treat yet what strange!
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que entered to examine the illness, then came out. Dong Anyu asked Bian Que, who said: "The blood vessels are in order, what is there to be surprised about!

sentences.zh: 昔秦穆公嘗如此，七日而寤。

translations.literal: Formerly Duke Mu of Qin was once like this, after seven days he awoke.

sentences.zh: 寤之日，告公孫支與子輿曰：『我之帝所甚樂。

translations.literal: Awake day, tell Gong Sun Zhi with Zi Yu said: "I at di place very happy.
translations.idiomatic: On the day he awoke, he told Gongsun Zhi and Ziyv: "I was very happy in the emperor's place.

sentences.zh: 吾所以久者，適有所學也。

translations.literal: The reason I stayed so long was that I had something to learn.

sentences.zh: 帝告我：「晉國且大亂，五世不安。

translations.literal: Di tell me: "Jin state and big chaos, five generations not settle.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor told me: "Jin state will soon have great chaos, five generations without peace.

sentences.zh: 其後將霸，未老而死。

translations.literal: Afterward it will become hegemon, but die before old age.

sentences.zh: 霸者之子且令而國男女無別。」』

translations.literal: Ba person son and make his state male female no distinguish.""
translations.idiomatic: The hegemon's son will cause his state to have no distinction between men and women.""

sentences.zh: 公孫支書而藏之，秦策於是出。

translations.literal: Gongsun Zhi wrote it and hid it, and the Qin strategies emerged from this.

sentences.zh: 夫獻公之亂，文公之霸，而襄公敗秦師於殽而歸縱淫，此子之所聞。

translations.literal: Duke Xian's chaos, Duke Wen's hegemony, Duke Xiang defeating the Qin army at Xiao and returning to indulge in lewdness—this is what the son has heard.

sentences.zh: 今主君之病與之同，不出三日必閒，閒必有言也。」

translations.literal: Now lord jun illness with it same, not out three days must wake, wake must have words."
translations.idiomatic: Now my lord's illness is the same as his, within three days he must awaken, and when he awakens he will certainly have words."

sentences.zh: 居二日半，簡子寤，語諸大夫曰：「我之帝所甚樂，與百神游於鈞天，廣樂九奏萬舞，不類三代之樂，其聲動心。

translations.literal: Live two days half, Jian Zi wake, speak various da fu said: "I at di place very happy, with hundred spirits wander at Hun Tian, broad music nine play wan dance, not like three generations music, its sound move heart.
translations.idiomatic: After two and a half days, Jianzi awoke and spoke to the various ministers: "I was very happy in the emperor's place, wandering with the hundred spirits in the Grand Heaven, broad music with nine performances and myriad dances, unlike the music of the Three Dynasties, its sound moved the heart.

sentences.zh: 有一熊欲援我，帝命我射之，中熊，熊死。

translations.literal: There was a bear that wanted to attack me, the emperor commanded me to shoot it, I hit the bear, the bear died.

sentences.zh: 有羆來，我又射之，中羆，羆死。

translations.literal: A pi bear came, I shot it again, hit the pi bear, the pi bear died.

sentences.zh: 帝甚喜，賜我二笥，皆有副。

translations.literal: The emperor was very pleased, granted me two baskets, both with duplicates.

sentences.zh: 吾見兒在帝側，帝屬我一翟犬，曰：『及而子之壯也以賜之。』

translations.literal: I see child at Di side, Di belong me one Di dog, said: "Reach your son strong also with grant him."
translations.idiomatic: I saw a child at the emperor's side, the emperor entrusted me with a Di dog, saying: "When your son grows strong, grant it to him."

sentences.zh: 帝告我：『晉國且世衰，七世而亡。

translations.literal: Di tell me: "Jin state and world decline, seven generations yet perish.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor told me: "Jin state will decline generation by generation, after seven generations it will perish.

sentences.zh: 嬴姓將大敗周人於范魁之西，而亦不能有也。』」

translations.literal: Ying surname will big defeat Zhou person at Fan Kui west, yet also cannot have it.""
translations.idiomatic: The Ying surname will greatly defeat the Zhou people west of Fan Kui, but will also not be able to possess it.""

sentences.zh: 董安于受言，書而藏之。

translations.literal: 董安于受言，書而藏之，以扁鵲言告簡子，簡子賜扁鵲田四萬畝。
translations.idiomatic: Dong Anyu received the words, wrote them and hid them, told Jianzi according to Bian Que's words, Jianzi granted Bian Que four thousand mu of fields.

sentences.zh: 以扁鵲言告簡子，簡子賜扁鵲田四萬畝。

translations.literal: 其後過虢，虢太子死，扁鵲至虢宮門下，問中庶子喜方者曰：「太子何病，國中治穰過於衆事？」
translations.idiomatic: Afterward passing through Guo, the Guo crown prince died. Bian Que came to the Guo palace gate and asked the palace attendant Xi Fang: "What illness did the crown prince have, that the state's treatment was so elaborate beyond all other matters?"

sentences.zh: 其後扁鵲過虢。

translations.literal: 中庶子曰：「太子病血氣不时，交錯而不得泄，暴發於外，則為中害。
translations.idiomatic: The palace attendant said: "The crown prince's illness was that his vital energies were irregular, entangled and could not be released, suddenly erupting outward, becoming internal harm.

sentences.zh: 虢太子死，扁鵲至虢宮門下，問中庶子喜方者曰：「太子何病，國中治穰過於眾事？」

translations.literal: 精神不能止邪氣，邪氣畜積而不得泄，是以陽緩而陰急，故暴蹶而死。」
translations.idiomatic: The spirit could not stop the evil energies, evil energies accumulated and could not be released, therefore yang was sluggish and yin was urgent, thus he suddenly collapsed and died."

sentences.zh: 中庶子曰：「太子病血氣不時，交錯而不得泄，暴發於外，則為中害。

translations.literal: 扁鵲曰：「其死何如時？」
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "When did he die?"

sentences.zh: 精神不能止邪氣，邪氣畜積而不得泄，是以陽緩而陰急，故暴蹷而死。」

translations.literal: 曰：「雞鳴至今。」
translations.idiomatic: He said: "From cockcrow until now."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「其死何如時？」

translations.literal: 曰：「收乎？」
translations.idiomatic: He said: "Has he been encoffined?"

sentences.zh: 曰：「雞鳴至今。」

translations.literal: 曰：「未也，其死未能半日也。」
translations.idiomatic: He said: "Not yet, his death has not been half a day."

sentences.zh: 曰：「收乎？」

translations.literal: 趙太子曰：「聞醫如秦穆公及平公也，兒不請勿往。」
translations.idiomatic: The Zhao crown prince said: "I have heard that physicians are like Duke Mu of Qin and Duke Ping, do not go if not requested."

sentences.zh: 曰：「未也，其死未能半日也。」

translations.literal: 至國，視太子，驚曰：「太子未死也。
translations.idiomatic: Arriving in the state, he examined the crown prince and was shocked, saying: "The crown prince is not dead.

sentences.zh: 「言臣齊勃海秦越人也，家在於鄭，未嘗得望精光侍謁於前也。

translations.literal: 扁鵲乃使弟子子陽厲鍼砥石，以取外三陽五會。
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que then had his disciple Ziyang sharpen the needle on stone, to take the outer three yang and five convergence points.

sentences.zh: 聞太子不幸而死，臣能生之。」

translations.literal: 有間，太子蘇。
translations.idiomatic: After a while, the crown prince revived.

sentences.zh: 中庶子曰：「先生得無誕之乎？

translations.literal: 乃使子豹為五分之熨，以八減之劑和煮之，以更熨兩脅下。
translations.idiomatic: Then he had Zibao make a five-part compress, mixed and boiled with an eight-reduction formula, to alternately compress both sides below the ribs.

sentences.zh: 何以言太子可生也！

translations.literal: 太子起坐。更適陰陽，但服湯二旬而復故。
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince sat up. He adjusted yin and yang, but after taking the decoction for twenty days he recovered as before.

sentences.zh: 臣聞上古之時，醫有俞跗，治病不以湯液醴灑，鑱石撟引，案扤毒熨，一撥見病之應，因五藏之輸，乃割皮解肌，訣脈結筋，搦髓腦，揲荒爪幕，湔浣腸胃，漱滌五藏，練精易形。

translations.literal: 故天下盡以扁鵲為能生死人。
translations.idiomatic: Therefore all under heaven considered Bian Que able to bring the dead back to life.

sentences.zh: 先生之方能若是，則太子可生也；

translations.literal: 扁鵲過齊，齊桓侯客之，入朝見，曰：「君有疾在腠理，不治將深。」
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que passed through Qi, Duke Huan of Qi hosted him. Entering court to see him, he said: "Your lordship has an illness in the skin texture, if not treated it will go deep."

sentences.zh: 不能若是而欲生之，曾不可以告咳嬰之兒。」

translations.literal: 桓侯曰：「寡人無疾。」
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan said: "I have no illness."

sentences.zh: 終日，扁鵲仰天嘆曰：「夫子之為方也，若以管窺天，以郄視文。

translations.literal: 扁鵲出，桓侯謂左右曰：「醫之好利也，欲以不疾者為功。」
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que left, Duke Huan said to those at his sides: "Physicians love profit, wanting to claim merit with those who have no illness."

sentences.zh: 越人之為方也，不待切脈望色聽聲寫形，言病之所在。

translations.literal: Yue Ren's method did not wait for pulse cutting, complexion observation, sound listening, or form recording to speak of the illness's location.

sentences.zh: 聞病之陽，論得其陰；

translations.literal: Hear illness yang, discuss get its yin;
translations.idiomatic: Hearing the illness's yang, he discussed and obtained its yin;

sentences.zh: 聞病之陰，論得其陽。

translations.literal: Hearing the illness's yin, he discussed and obtained its yang.

sentences.zh: 病應見於大表，不出千里，決者至眾，不可曲止也。

translations.literal: The illness should appear on the great surface, not going beyond a thousand li, those who decide reach many, cannot be arbitrarily stopped.

sentences.zh: 子以吾言為不誠，試入診太子，當聞其耳鳴而鼻張，循其兩股以至於陰，當尚溫也。」

translations.literal: Zi with I speak become not sincere, try enter diagnose crown prince, should hear his ear ring yet nose expand, follow his two thighs to reach yin, should still warm."
translations.idiomatic: You consider my words insincere, try entering to diagnose the crown prince, you should hear his ears ringing and nose flaring, following his two thighs to reach the yin, it should still be warm."

sentences.zh: 中庶子聞扁鵲言，目眩然而不瞚，舌撟然而不下，乃以扁鵲言入報虢君。

translations.literal: The palace attendant heard Bian Que's words, eyes dazzled but not blinking, tongue extended but not descending, then entered with Bian Que's words to report to the Guo ruler.

sentences.zh: 虢君聞之大驚，出見扁鵲於中闕，曰：「竊聞高義之日久矣，然未嘗得拜謁於前也。

translations.literal: Guo jun hear very shocked, exit see Bian Que at zhong que, said: "Secret hear high righteousness day long, yet not once obtain bow ye at front.
translations.idiomatic: The Guo ruler heard and was greatly shocked, came out to see Bian Que at the middle gate, saying: "I have secretly heard of your noble righteousness for a long time, yet never once obtained to bow and visit before you.

sentences.zh: 先生過小國，幸而舉之，偏國寡臣幸甚。

translations.literal: Sir passes through our small state, fortunately raises this matter, our partial state and few ministers are very fortunate.

sentences.zh: 有先生則活，無先生則棄捐填溝壑，長終而不得反。」

translations.literal: Have sir then live, no sir then abandon throw fill ravine valley, long end yet not obtain return."
translations.idiomatic: With sir then he lives, without sir then he is abandoned and thrown to fill the ravines and valleys, eternally ended and cannot return."

sentences.zh: 言末卒，因噓唏服臆，魂精泄橫，流涕長潸，忽忽承睫，悲不能自止，容貌變更。

translations.literal: The words not yet finished, he sighed and wept embracing his breast, soul essence leaking horizontally, flowing tears long moistening, suddenly accepting the eyelashes, sorrow could not be stopped by himself, appearance changed.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「若太子病，所謂『尸蹷』者也。

translations.literal: Bian Que said: "If crown prince illness, so call "shi jue" person.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "The crown prince's illness is what is called 'corpse convulsions.'

sentences.zh: 夫以陽入陰中，動胃繵緣，中經維絡，別下於三焦、膀胱，是以陽脈下遂，陰脈上爭，會氣閉而不通，陰上而陽內行，下內鼓而不起，上外絕而不為使，上有絕陽之絡，下有破陰之紐，破陰絕陽，（之）色［已］廢脈亂，故形靜如死狀。

translations.literal: Because yang entered the yin center, moved the stomach and entangled the vessels, through the central classics and binding networks, separately descending to the three burners and bladder, therefore yang pulses descended and followed, yin pulses ascended and contended, meeting energies closed and not through, yin ascended yet yang walked inwardly, lower internal drumming yet not rising, upper external severance yet not functioning, above having severed yang networks, below having broken yin knots, broken yin severed yang, appearance already wasted pulses chaotic, therefore form quiet like death shape.

sentences.zh: 太子未死也。

translations.literal: The crown prince is not dead.

sentences.zh: 夫以陽入陰支蘭藏者生，以陰入陽支蘭藏者死。

translations.literal: Because yang entering yin branch vessels lives, yin entering yang branch vessels dies.

sentences.zh: 凡此數事，皆五藏蹙中之時暴作也。

translations.literal: All these several matters are all sudden attacks at the time of the five viscera's contraction.

sentences.zh: 良工取之，拙者疑殆。」

translations.literal: Good work take it, clumsy person doubt dai."
translations.idiomatic: Good craftsmen take it, clumsy ones doubt and hesitate."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲乃使弟子子陽厲鍼砥石，以取外三陽五會。

translations.literal: Bian Que then had his disciple Ziyang sharpen the needle on stone, to take the outer three yang and five convergence points.

sentences.zh: 有閒，太子蘇。

translations.literal: After an interval, the crown prince revived.

sentences.zh: 乃使子豹為五分之熨，以八減之齊和煮之，以更熨兩脅下。

translations.literal: Then he had Zibao make a five-part compress, mixed and boiled with an eight-reduction decoction, to alternately compress both sides below.

sentences.zh: 太子起坐。

translations.literal: The crown prince sat up.

sentences.zh: 更適陰陽，但服湯二旬而復故。

translations.literal: He adjusted yin and yang more, but after taking the decoction for twenty days he recovered as before.

sentences.zh: 故天下盡以扁鵲為能生死人。

translations.literal: Therefore all under heaven considered Bian Que able to bring the dead back to life.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「越人非能生死人也，此自當生者，越人能使之起耳。」

translations.literal: Bian Que said: "Yue Ren not able life death person, this self should live person, Yue Ren able make it rise ear."
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "Yue Ren cannot bring the dead to life, these are people who should live themselves, Yue Ren can only make them rise."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲過齊，齊桓侯客之。

translations.literal: Bian Que passed through Qi, Duke Huan of Qi hosted him.

sentences.zh: 入朝見，曰：「君有疾在腠理，不治將深。」

translations.literal: Enter court see, said: "Jun have illness at cou li, not treat will deep."
translations.idiomatic: Entering court to see him, he said: "Your lordship has an illness in the skin texture, if not treated it will go deep."

sentences.zh: 桓侯曰：「寡人無疾。」

translations.literal: Huan Hou said: "Sha ren no illness."
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan said: "I have no illness."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲出，桓侯謂左右曰：「醫之好利也，欲以不疾者為功。」

translations.literal: Bian Que exit, Huan Hou speak left right said: "Doctor good profit, desire with not illness become merit."
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que left, Duke Huan said to those at his sides: "Physicians love profit, wanting to claim merit with those who have no illness."

sentences.zh: 後五日，扁鵲復見，曰：「君有疾在血脈，不治恐深。」

translations.literal: After five days, Bian Que again see, said: "Jun have illness at blood pulse, not treat fear deep."
translations.idiomatic: After five days, Bian Que saw him again, saying: "Your lordship has an illness in the blood vessels, if not treated I fear it will go deep."

sentences.zh: 桓侯曰：「寡人無疾。」

translations.literal: Huan Hou said: "Sha ren no illness."
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan said: "I have no illness."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲出，桓侯不悅。

translations.literal: Bian Que left, Duke Huan was displeased.

sentences.zh: 後五日，扁鵲復見，曰；

translations.literal: After five days, Bian Que again see, said;
translations.idiomatic: After five days, Bian Que saw him again, saying:

sentences.zh: 「君有疾在腸胃閒，不治將深。」

translations.literal: "Jun have illness at intestine stomach interval, not treat will deep."
translations.idiomatic: "Your lordship has an illness in the space between intestines and stomach, if not treated it will go deep."

sentences.zh: 桓侯不應。

translations.literal: Duke Huan did not respond.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲出，桓侯不悅。

translations.literal: Bian Que left, Duke Huan was displeased.

sentences.zh: 後五日，扁鵲復見，望見桓侯而退走。

translations.literal: After five days, Bian Que saw him again, but seeing Duke Huan he retreated and fled.

sentences.zh: 桓侯使人問其故。

translations.literal: Duke Huan sent someone to ask the reason.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「疾之居腠理也，湯熨之所及也；

translations.literal: Bian Que said: "Illness reside cou li, soup compress place reach;
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "When the illness resides in the skin texture, it is where soup compresses can reach;

sentences.zh: 在血脈，鍼石之所及也；

translations.literal: At blood pulse, needle stone place reach;
translations.idiomatic: In the blood vessels, it is where needles and stones can reach;

sentences.zh: 其在腸胃，酒醪之所及也；

translations.literal: Its at intestine stomach, wine lao place reach;
translations.idiomatic: When it is in the intestines and stomach, it is where wine medicinals can reach;

sentences.zh: 其在骨髓，雖司命無柰之何。

translations.literal: When it is in the bone marrow, even the Controller of Fate can do nothing about it.

sentences.zh: 今在骨髓，臣是以無請也。」

translations.literal: Now at bone marrow, minister therefore no please."
translations.idiomatic: Now it is in the bone marrow, therefore I have no request."

sentences.zh: 後五日，桓侯體病，使人召扁鵲，扁鵲已逃去。

translations.literal: After five days, Duke Huan's body became ill, he sent someone to summon Bian Que, but Bian Que had already fled.

sentences.zh: 桓侯遂死。

translations.literal: Duke Huan then died.

sentences.zh: 使聖人預知微，能使良醫得蚤從事，則疾可已，身可活也。

translations.literal: If sages could foreknow the subtle, able to make good physicians begin affairs early, then illnesses could be cured, bodies could live.

sentences.zh: 人之所病，病疾多；

translations.literal: Person place illness, illness disease many;
translations.idiomatic: What people suffer from illness, illnesses and diseases are many;

sentences.zh: 而醫之所病，病道少。

translations.literal: But what physicians suffer from illness, illnesses of the Way are few.

sentences.zh: 故病有六不治：驕恣不論於理，一不治也；

translations.literal: Therefore illness have six not treat: arrogant zi not discuss at li, one not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore illnesses have six that are not treated: arrogant indulgence not discussed according to principle, first not treated;

sentences.zh: 輕身重財，二不治也；

translations.literal: Light body heavy wealth, two not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Lightening the body but valuing wealth heavily, second not treated;

sentences.zh: 衣食不能適，三不治也；

translations.literal: Clothes food cannot adapt, three not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Clothing and food cannot be adapted, third not treated;

sentences.zh: 陰陽并，藏氣不定，四不治也；

translations.literal: Yin yang bing, hide qi not fixed, four not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Yin and yang confused, visceral energies not settled, fourth not treated;

sentences.zh: 形羸不能服藥，五不治也；

translations.literal: Shape lean cannot serve medicine, five not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Body emaciated cannot take medicine, fifth not treated;

sentences.zh: 信巫不信醫，六不治也。

translations.literal: Believing shamans not believing physicians, sixth not treated.

sentences.zh: 有此一者，則重難治也。

translations.literal: Having one of these, then it is very difficult to treat.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲名聞天下。

translations.literal: Bian Que's name was heard throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 過邯鄲，聞貴婦人，即為帶下醫；

translations.literal: Pass Han Dan, hear noble woman person, then become dai xia doctor;
translations.idiomatic: Passing through Handan, hearing that noble women had ailments, he then became a physician for women's diseases;

sentences.zh: 過雒陽，聞周人愛老人，即為耳目痹醫；

translations.literal: Pass Luo Yang, hear Zhou person love old person, then become ear eye bi doctor;
translations.idiomatic: Passing through Luoyang, hearing that Zhou people loved the elderly, he then became a physician for ear and eye ailments;

sentences.zh: 來入咸陽，聞秦人愛小兒，即為小兒醫：隨俗為變。

translations.literal: Come enter Xian Yang, hear Qin person love small child, then become small child doctor: follow custom become change.
translations.idiomatic: Coming to enter Xianyang, hearing that Qin people loved children, he then became a children's physician: following customs he changed.

sentences.zh: 秦太醫令李醯自知伎不如扁鵲也，使人刺殺之。

translations.literal: The Qin Chief Physician Li Xi himself knew his skills were not equal to Bian Que's, so he sent someone to assassinate him.

sentences.zh: 至今天下言脈者，由扁鵲也。

translations.literal: Until today when all under heaven speak of pulse diagnosis, it originates from Bian Que.

sentences.zh: 太倉公者，齊太倉長，臨菑人也，姓淳于氏，名意。

translations.literal: Tai Cang Gong was the Qi granary director, a Linzi person, surname Chunyu, given name Yi.

sentences.zh: 少而喜醫方術。

translations.literal: In youth he delighted in medical arts and techniques.

sentences.zh: 高后八年，更受師同郡元里公乘陽慶。

translations.literal: In Empress Gao's eighth year, he again received teachings from his fellow commandery man, Gongcheng Yang Qing of Yuanli.

sentences.zh: 慶年七十餘，無子，使意盡去其故方，更悉以禁方予之，傳黃帝、扁鵲之脈書，五色診病，知人死生，決嫌疑，定可治，及藥論，甚精。

translations.literal: Qing was over seventy years old, had no son, made Yi completely abandon his old prescriptions, and moreover gave him all the secret prescriptions, transmitting the Yellow Emperor and Bian Que's pulse books, five-color diagnosis of illness, knowing people's death and life, deciding suspicions, fixing what can be treated, and medicine discussions, very refined.

sentences.zh: 受之三年，為人治病，決死生多驗。

translations.literal: After receiving teachings for three years, when treating people's illnesses, his decisions on death and life were mostly verified.

sentences.zh: 然左右行游諸侯，不以家為家，或不為人治病，病家多怨之者。

translations.literal: Yet he traveled left and right among the various feudal lords, not considering home as home, sometimes not treating people's illnesses, the ill families mostly resented him.

sentences.zh: 文帝四年中，人上書言意，以刑罪當傳西之長安。

translations.literal: In the middle of Emperor Wen's fourth year, someone submitted a memorial speaking of Yi, who due to criminal punishment should be transported west to Chang'an.

sentences.zh: 意有五女，隨而泣。

translations.literal: Yi had five daughters, who followed him weeping.

sentences.zh: 意怒，罵曰：「生子不生男，緩急無可使者！」

translations.literal: Yi angry, curse said: "Born child not born male, slow urgent no able use!"
translations.idiomatic: Yi was angry, cursed saying: "Giving birth to children but not giving birth to males, in times of urgency there's no one to use!"

sentences.zh: 於是少女緹縈傷父之言，乃隨父西。

translations.literal: Then the youngest daughter Tiying was hurt by her father's words, and followed her father west.

sentences.zh: 上書曰：「妾父為吏，齊中稱其廉平，今坐法當刑。

translations.literal: Shang book said: "Qie father become li, Qi middle call his clean level, now sit law should punishment.
translations.idiomatic: She submitted a memorial saying: "My father serves as official, in Qi he is called clean and fair, now convicted by law he should be punished.

sentences.zh: 妾切痛死者不可復生而刑者不可復續，雖欲改過自新，其道莫由，終不可得。

translations.literal: I deeply grieve that the dead cannot be brought back to life and the punished cannot have their bodies restored, though desiring to reform faults and renew themselves, there is no way, ultimately cannot be obtained.

sentences.zh: 妾願入身為官婢，以贖父刑罪，使得改行自新也。」

translations.literal: Qie wish enter body become official slave, with redeem father punishment crime, make obtain change conduct self new."
translations.idiomatic: I wish to enter my body as an official slave, to redeem my father's punishment crime, so he may obtain to change his conduct and renew himself."

sentences.zh: 書聞，上悲其意，此歲中亦除肉刑法。

translations.literal: The memorial was heard, the emperor was saddened by her intent, and in the middle of this year also abolished the mutilating punishment laws.

sentences.zh: 意家居，詔召問所為治病死生驗者幾何人也，主名為誰。

translations.literal: Yi resided at home, an edict summoned him and asked how many people he had treated for illnesses with verified predictions of death and life, and whose main names they were.

sentences.zh: 詔問故太倉長臣意：「方伎所長，及所能治病者？

translations.literal: Zhao ask old tai cang chang minister Yi: "Method ji place long, and able treat illness?"
translations.idiomatic: The edict asked the former granary director Minister Yi: "What are your medical arts skilled in, and what illnesses can you treat?"

sentences.zh: 有其書無有？

translations.literal: Have its book no have?
translations.idiomatic: Do you have its books or not?

sentences.zh: 皆安受學？

translations.literal: All where receive study?
translations.idiomatic: Where did you all receive your studies?

sentences.zh: 受學幾何歲？

translations.literal: Receive study several what year?
translations.idiomatic: How many years did you receive study?

sentences.zh: 嘗有所驗，何縣里人也？

translations.literal: Once have what verify, what county li person?
translations.idiomatic: What verifications have you had, what county and quarter people?

sentences.zh: 何病？

translations.literal: What illness?

sentences.zh: 醫藥已，其病之狀皆何如？

translations.literal: Doctor medicine already, its illness shape all what like?
translations.idiomatic: After doctor and medicine, what was the condition of the illness like?

sentences.zh: 具悉而對。」

translations.literal: Ju all yet answer."
translations.idiomatic: Fully and completely answer."

sentences.zh: 臣意對曰：

translations.literal: Minister Yi answer said:
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi replied:

sentences.zh: 自意少時，喜醫藥，醫藥方試之多不驗者。

translations.literal: From Yi's youth, he delighted in medicine, but tried many medical methods that were not verified.

sentences.zh: 至高后八年，得見師臨菑元里公乘陽慶。

translations.literal: Until Empress Gao's eighth year, he obtained to see the teacher Gongcheng Yang Qing of Linzi Yuanli.

sentences.zh: 慶年七十餘，意得見事之。

translations.literal: Qing was over seventy years old, Yi obtained to see and serve him.

sentences.zh: 謂意曰：「盡去而方書，非是也。

translations.literal: Speak Yi said: "All go your recipe book, not this.
translations.idiomatic: He said to Yi: "Completely abandon your prescription books, they are not this.

sentences.zh: 慶有古先道遺傳黃帝、扁鵲之脈書，五色診病，知人生死，決嫌疑，定可治，及藥論書，甚精。

translations.literal: Qing has ancient transmitted teachings of the Yellow Emperor and Bian Que's pulse books, five-color diagnosis of illness, knowing people's life and death, deciding suspicions, fixing what can be treated, and medicine discussion books, very refined.

sentences.zh: 我家給富，心愛公，欲盡以我禁方書悉教公。」

translations.literal: I home give rich, heart love gong, desire all with I forbidden recipe book all teach gong."
translations.idiomatic: My family is wealthy and comfortable, I love you in my heart, I desire to teach you all my secret prescription books completely."

sentences.zh: 臣意即曰：「幸甚，非意之所敢望也。」

translations.literal: Minister Yi then said: "Fortunate very, not Yi place dare hope."
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi then said: "Very fortunate, not something Yi dared hope for."

sentences.zh: 臣意即避席再拜謁，受其脈書上下經、五色診、奇咳術、揆度陰陽外變、藥論、石神、接陰陽禁書，受讀解驗之，可一年所。

translations.literal: Minister Yi then left his seat and bowed twice in respect, received his pulse books of upper and lower classics, five-color diagnosis, strange cough techniques, measuring yin and yang external changes, medicine discussions, stone gods, connecting yin and yang forbidden books, received them and read, explained, and verified them, taking about a year.

sentences.zh: 明歲即驗之，有驗，然尚未精也。

translations.literal: The next year he then verified them, there were verifications, but not yet refined.

sentences.zh: 要事之三年所，即嘗已為人治，診病決死生，有驗，精良。

translations.literal: After three years of important study, then he once treated people, diagnosing illnesses and deciding death and life, there were verifications, refined and good.

sentences.zh: 今慶已死十年所，臣意年盡三年，年三十九歲也。

translations.literal: Now Qing has been dead for about ten years, Minister Yi has completed three years of age, is thirty-nine years old.

sentences.zh: 齊侍御史成自言病頭痛，臣意診其脈，告曰：「君之病惡，不可言也。」

translations.literal: Qi serve yu shi Cheng self speak illness head pain, minister Yi diagnose his pulse, tell said: "Jun illness evil, not able speak."
translations.idiomatic: The Qi Imperial Secretary Cheng himself said he had headache illness, Minister Yi diagnosed his pulse, told him: "Your lordship's illness is serious, cannot be spoken of."

sentences.zh: 即出，獨告成弟昌曰：「此病疽也，內發於腸胃之閒，後五日當擁腫，後八日嘔膿死。」

translations.literal: Then exit, alone tell Cheng brother Chang said: "This illness ju, inner send at intestine stomach interval, after five days should yong zhong, after eight days ou nong die."
translations.idiomatic: Then he left, alone told Cheng's brother Chang: "This illness is a carbuncle, internally developing in the space between intestines and stomach, after five days it should swell and gather, after eight days vomit pus and die."

sentences.zh: 成之病得之飲酒且內。

translations.literal: Cheng's illness came from drinking wine and sexual excess.

sentences.zh: 成即如期死。

translations.literal: Cheng then died as predicted.

sentences.zh: 所以知成之病者，臣意切其脈，得肝氣。

translations.literal: The reason I knew Cheng's illness was that Minister Yi cut his pulse and obtained liver energy.

sentences.zh: 肝氣濁而靜，此內關之病也。

translations.literal: Liver energy turbid yet quiet, this is an inner barrier illness.

sentences.zh: 脈法曰「脈長而弦，不得代四時者，其病主在於肝。

translations.literal: Pulse method say "pulse long yet string, not able dai four seasons, its illness main at liver.
translations.idiomatic: The pulse method says "pulse long and tense, unable to substitute for the four seasons, the illness mainly resides in the liver.

sentences.zh: 和即經主病也，代則絡脈有過」。

translations.literal: Harmony then classic main illness, dai then luo pulse have fault".
translations.idiomatic: Harmony then the classic governs the illness, substitution then the network vessels have fault."

sentences.zh: 經主病和者，其病得之筋髓里。

translations.literal: When the classic governs illness in harmony, the illness comes from the muscle marrow interior.

sentences.zh: 其代絕而脈賁者，病得之酒且內。

translations.literal: When substitution breaks and pulse surges, illness comes from wine and sexual excess.

sentences.zh: 所以知其後五日而擁腫，八日嘔膿死者，切其脈時，少陽初代。

translations.literal: The reason I knew it would swell and gather after five days, vomit pus and die after eight days, when I cut his pulse, lesser yang initially substituted.

sentences.zh: 代者經病，病去過人，人則去。

translations.literal: Substitution means classic illness, illness exceeds the person, person then dies.

sentences.zh: 絡脈主病，當其時，少陽初關一分，故中熱而膿未發也，及五分，則至少陽之界，及八日，則嘔膿死，故上二分而膿發，至界而擁腫，盡泄而死。

translations.literal: Network vessels govern illness, at that time, lesser yang initially closed one fen, therefore internally hot but pus not erupted, reaching five fen then to lesser yang's boundary, reaching eight days then vomits pus and dies, therefore ascending two fen and...

sentences.zh: 熱上則熏陽明，爛流絡，流絡動則脈結發，脈結發則爛解，故絡交。

translations.literal: Heat ascending then steams the yang brightness, rotting flows the networks, flowing networks move then pulse knots erupt, pulse knots erupt then rot dissolves, therefore networks intersect.

sentences.zh: 熱氣已上行，至頭而動，故頭痛。

translations.literal: Hot energy already ascended, reaching the head and moving, therefore headache.

sentences.zh: 齊王中子諸嬰兒小子病，召臣意診切其脈，告曰：「氣鬲病。

translations.literal: Qi wang middle son Zhu Ying Er Xiao Zi illness, summon minister Yi diagnose cut his pulse, tell said: "Qi ge illness.
translations.idiomatic: The Qi king's middle son Zhu Ying'er Xiaozi fell ill, summoned Minister Yi to diagnose and cut his pulse, told him: "Diaphragm energy illness.

sentences.zh: 病使人煩懣，食不下，時嘔沫。

translations.literal: The illness makes a person vexed and oppressed, unable to eat, sometimes vomiting foam.

sentences.zh: 病得之（少）［心］憂，數忔食飲。」

translations.literal: Illness get it heart you, shu shi eat drink."
translations.idiomatic: The illness comes from heart sorrow, frequently sighing while eating and drinking."

sentences.zh: 臣意即為之作下氣湯以飲之，一日氣下，二日能食，三日即病愈。

translations.literal: Minister Yi then made descending energy soup for him to drink, one day energy descended, two days able to eat, three days then illness cured.

sentences.zh: 所以知小子之病者，診其脈，心氣也，濁躁而經也，此絡陽病也。

translations.literal: The reason I knew the young son's illness was diagnosing his pulse—heart energy, turbid and agitated yet classical, this is network yang illness.

sentences.zh: 脈法曰「脈來數疾去難而不一者，病主在心」。

translations.literal: Pulse method say "pulse come shu ji go nan yet not one, illness main at heart".
translations.idiomatic: The pulse method says "pulse comes rapid and urgent goes difficult and not uniform, illness mainly at heart".

sentences.zh: 周身熱，脈盛者，為重陽。

translations.literal: 滎陽嚴長孫女患眩，診之，告曰：「為藥中，病去身溫，六日愈。」
translations.idiomatic: Xingyang Yan's grandson's daughter suffered dizziness, diagnosed her and said: "Take medicine, illness will leave body warm, six days cured."

sentences.zh: 重陽者，逿心主。

translations.literal: 即如期愈。
translations.idiomatic: Indeed as predicted cured.

sentences.zh: 故煩懣食不下則絡脈有過，絡脈有過則血上出，血上出者死。

translations.literal: 所以知女之病者，診其脈，肝氣也，葷而實，此脈法曰「脈來實而葷者，病內熱而聾」。
translations.idiomatic: The reason I knew the girl's illness was diagnosing her pulse—liver energy, strong and substantial, this pulse method says "pulse comes substantial and strong, illness internal heat and deaf".

sentences.zh: 此悲心所生也，病得之憂也。

translations.literal: 葷則母有姙，葷即為熱，熱即為聾，聾即為眩，眩即為經厥，經厥則不足，耳聾。」
translations.idiomatic: Strong then mother has pregnancy, strong becomes heat, heat becomes deaf, deaf becomes dizzy, dizzy becomes classic reversal, classic reversal then deficient, ear deaf."

sentences.zh: 齊郎中令循病，眾醫皆以為蹙入中，而刺之。

translations.literal: 診之，六月，姙。
translations.idiomatic: Diagnosed her, six months pregnant.

sentences.zh: 臣意診之，曰：「湧疝也，令人不得前後溲。」

translations.literal: 姙六月，當堅，立秋氣至而堅，堅則熱，熱則瘖，瘖則為聾，聾即為眩。
translations.idiomatic: Pregnant six months, should solidify, autumn energy arrives and solidifies, solidifies then heat, heat then mute, mute then deaf, deaf then dizzy.

sentences.zh: 循曰：「不得前後溲三日矣。」

translations.literal: 姙六月，君姙二月，餘四月而瘖，女病，姙三月而眩，姙三月而熱，熱即為聾，聾即為眩。
translations.idiomatic: Pregnant six months, you pregnant two months, remaining four months then mute, girl ill, pregnant three months then dizzy, pregnant three months then heat, heat becomes deaf, deaf becomes dizzy.

sentences.zh: 臣意飲以火齊湯，一飲得前［后］溲，再飲大溲，三飲而疾愈。

translations.literal: 故瘖即為熱，熱即為聾，聾即為眩也。
translations.idiomatic: Therefore mute becomes heat, heat becomes deaf, deaf becomes dizzy.

sentences.zh: 病得之內。

translations.literal: 姙母，其脈葷而實，葷則為熱，熱則為瘖，瘖即為聾，聾即為眩，故女子之脈當葷，葷即為熱，熱即為瘖，瘖即為聾，聾即為眩也。
translations.idiomatic: Pregnant mother, her pulse strong and substantial, strong becomes heat, heat becomes mute, mute becomes deaf, deaf becomes dizzy, therefore woman's pulse should be strong, strong becomes heat, heat becomes mute, mute becomes deaf, deaf becomes dizzy.

sentences.zh: 所以知循病者，切其脈時，右口氣急，脈無五藏氣，右口脈大而數。

translations.literal: The reason I knew Xun's illness was when I cut his pulse, right mouth energy urgent, pulse without five viscera energies, right mouth pulse large and rapid.

sentences.zh: 數者中下熱而湧，左為下，右為上，皆無五藏應，故曰湧疝。

translations.literal: Rapid means middle and lower hot and surging, left is lower, right is upper, all without five viscera response, therefore called surging hernia.

sentences.zh: 中熱，故溺赤也。

translations.literal: Internal heat, therefore urine red.

sentences.zh: 齊中御府長信病，臣意入診其脈，告曰：「熱病氣也。

translations.literal: Qi zhong yu fu chang Xin illness, minister Yi enter diagnose his pulse, tell said: "Hot illness qi.
translations.idiomatic: Qi's central imperial storehouse director Xin fell ill, Minister Yi entered and diagnosed his pulse, told him: "Heat illness energy.

sentences.zh: 然暑汗，脈少衰，不死。」

translations.literal: Yet shu han, pulse shao cui, not die."
translations.idiomatic: But summer sweat, pulse slightly declines, will not die."

sentences.zh: 曰：「此病得之當浴流水而寒甚，已則熱。」

translations.literal: Said: "This illness get it should yu liu shui yet han very, already then hot."
translations.idiomatic: He said: "This illness comes from bathing in flowing water and extreme cold, afterward then heat."

sentences.zh: 信曰：「唯，然！

translations.literal: Xin said: "Wei, ran!
translations.idiomatic: Xin said: "Yes, indeed!

sentences.zh: 往冬時，為王使於楚，至莒縣陽周水，而莒橋梁頗壞，信則擥車轅未欲渡也，馬驚，即墮，信身入水中，幾死，吏即來救信，出之水中，衣盡濡，有閒而身寒，已熱如火，至今不可以見寒。」

translations.literal: Go winter time, become wang make at Chu, reach Ju jun Yang Zhou shui, yet Ju qiao liang po huai, Xin then luan che yuan not desire du, ma jing, then fall, Xin body enter water middle, ji die, li then come save Xin, out it water middle, clothes all ru, have interval yet body han, already hot like fire, reach now not able see han."
translations.idiomatic: In winter, serving as king's envoy to Chu, reaching Ju county Yangzhou waters, and the Ju bridge piers quite damaged, Xin then grasped the carriage shaft not wanting to cross, horse startled, then fell, Xin's body entered the water, nearly died, officials then came to save Xin, pulled him out of the water, clothes all soaked, after interval body cold, then hot like fire, until now cannot see cold."

sentences.zh: 臣意即為之液湯火齊逐熱，一飲汗盡，再飲熱去，三飲病已。

translations.literal: Minister Yi then made fluid soup fire elixir to expel heat for him, one drink sweat completely, second drink heat gone, third drink illness cured.

sentences.zh: 即使服藥，出入二十日，身無病者。

translations.literal: Then had him take medicine, coming and going twenty days, body without illness.

sentences.zh: 所以知信之病者，切其脈時，并陰。

translations.literal: The reason I knew Xin's illness was when I cut his pulse, parallel yin.

sentences.zh: 脈法曰「熱病陰陽交者死」。

translations.literal: Pulse method say "hot illness yin yang jiao person die".
translations.idiomatic: The pulse method says "heat illness where yin and yang intersect, dies".

sentences.zh: 切之不交，并陰。

translations.literal: Cut it not intersecting, parallel yin.

sentences.zh: 并陰者，脈順清而愈，其熱雖未盡，猶活也。

translations.literal: Parallel yin means pulse smooth clear and cured, its heat though not exhausted, still lives.

sentences.zh: 腎氣有時閒濁，在太陰脈口而希，是水氣也。

translations.literal: Kidney energy sometimes clear turbid, at taiyin pulse mouth and sparse, this is water energy.

sentences.zh: 腎固主水，故以此知之。

translations.literal: Kidney firmly governs water, therefore with this know it.

sentences.zh: 失治一時，即轉為寒熱。

translations.literal: Lose treatment one time, then turns to cold heat.

sentences.zh: 齊王太后病，召臣意入診脈，曰：「風癉客脬，難於大小溲，溺赤。」

translations.literal: Ask minister Yi: "Suo diagnose treat illness, illness name duo tong yet diagnose yi, or die or not die, what?"
translations.idiomatic: Asked Minister Yi: "Diagnosed treated illnesses, illness names mostly same but diagnoses different, some die some not die, why?"

sentences.zh: 對曰：「病名多相類，不可知，故古聖人為之脈法，以起度量，立規矩，縣權衡，案繩墨，調陰陽，別人之脈各名之，與天地相應，參合於人，故乃別百病以異之，有數者能異之，無數者同之。

translations.literal: Dui said: "Illness name duo xiang lei, not able know, therefore gu sheng ren become it pulse fa, with qi du liang, li gui ju, xuan quan heng, an sheng mo, diao yin yang, bie ren zhi pulse ge ming it, with tian di xiang ying, can he yu ren, therefore then bie bai illness with yi it, have shu person able yi it, no shu person tong it.
translations.idiomatic: Answered: "Illness names mostly similar, cannot know, therefore ancient sages made pulse method for it, to establish measurements, set rules, hang balances, press ink lines, regulate yin yang, distinguish people's pulses each name them, with heaven earth corresponding, examine combine with person, therefore then distinguish hundred illnesses to differentiate them, having numbers can differentiate them, no numbers make same.

sentences.zh: 然脈法不可勝驗，診疾人以度異之，乃可別同名，命病主在所居。

translations.literal: But pulse method cannot win verification, diagnose ill person with degree differentiate them, then can distinguish same names, name illness master in location resided.

sentences.zh: 今臣意所診者，皆有診籍。

translations.literal: Now Minister Yi's diagnosed persons, all have diagnosis records.

sentences.zh: 所以別之者，臣意所受師方適成，師死，以故表籍所診，期決死生，觀所失所得者合脈法，以故至今知之。」

translations.literal: So bie it person, minister Yi suo shou shi fang shi cheng, shi die, with gu biao ji suo diagnose, period decide death life, guan suo shi suo de person he pulse fa, with gu zhi jin know it."
translations.idiomatic: The reason to distinguish them is Minister Yi received teacher method just completed, teacher died, therefore made record table of diagnoses, period decisions death life, observed what lost what gained matched pulse method, therefore until now know it."

sentences.zh: 問臣意曰：「所期病決死生，或不應期，何故？」

translations.literal: Ask minister Yi said: "Suo period illness decide death life, or not ying period, what gu?"
translations.idiomatic: Asked Minister Yi: "Diagnosed period illnesses decide death life, some not respond to period, why?"

sentences.zh: 對曰：「此皆飲食喜怒不節，或不當飲藥，或不當鍼灸，以故不中期死也。」

translations.literal: Dui said: "This all eat drink xi nu not jie, or not dang yin medicine, or not dang zhen jiu, with gu not zhong period die."
translations.idiomatic: Answered: "This all eating drinking joy anger not regulated, or not proper drinking medicine, or not proper needle moxa, therefore not mid-period die."

sentences.zh: 問臣意：「意方能知病死生，論藥用所宜，諸侯王大臣有嘗問意者不？

translations.literal: Ask minister Yi: "Yi fang able know illness death life, lun medicine use suo yi, zhu hou wang da chen have chang ask yi person not?
translations.idiomatic: Asked Minister Yi: "Yi just able know illness death life, discuss medicine use appropriate, feudal lords kings ministers have ever asked Yi not?

sentences.zh: 及文王病時，不求意診治，何故？」

translations.literal: And Wen wang illness time, not seek Yi diagnose treat, what gu?"
translations.idiomatic: And when Wen Wang fell ill, why not seek Minister Yi to diagnose and treat?"

sentences.zh: 對曰：「趙王、膠西王、濟南王、吳王皆使人來召臣意，臣意不敢往。

translations.literal: Dui said: "Zhao wang, Jiao xi wang, Ji nan wang, Wu wang all make person come summon minister Yi, minister Yi not gan go.
translations.idiomatic: Answered: "Zhao King, Jiaoxi King, Jinan King, Wu King all sent people to summon Minister Yi, Minister Yi dared not go.

sentences.zh: 文王病時，臣意家貧，欲為人治病，誠恐吏以除拘臣意也，故移名數，左右不修家生，出行游國中，問善為方數者事之久矣，見事數師，悉受其要事，盡其方書意，及解論之。

translations.literal: When Wen Wang fell ill, Minister Yi's family was poor, wanted to treat people's illnesses, sincerely feared officials would arrest Minister Yi for practicing without license, therefore changed name and residence, attendants did not attend to family livelihood, went walking and traveling in the state, asked good formula method practitioners to serve them for long periods, saw and served several teachers, all received their essential matters, mastered their formula books and intentions, and solved their discussions.

sentences.zh: 身居陽虛侯國，因事侯。

translations.literal: Personally resided in Yangxu Marquis's fief, because of serving the marquis.

sentences.zh: 侯入朝，臣意從之長安，以故得診安陵項處等病也。」

translations.literal: Hou enter chao, minister Yi from it Chang an, with gu get diagnose An ling Xiang chu deng illness."
translations.idiomatic: Marquis entered court, Minister Yi followed him to Chang'an, therefore got to diagnose Anling Xiang Chu and others' illnesses."

sentences.zh: 問臣意：「知文王所以得病不起之狀？」

translations.literal: Ask minister Yi: "Know Wen wang so get illness not rise zhi zhuang?"
translations.idiomatic: Asked Minister Yi: "Know Wen Wang's illness such that he could not rise condition?"

sentences.zh: 臣意對曰：「不見文王病，然竊聞文王病喘，頭痛，目不明。

translations.literal: Minister Yi dui said: "Not see Wen wang illness, ran she hear Wen wang illness chuan, tou tong, mu not ming.
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi answered: "Did not see Wen Wang's illness, but secretly heard Wen Wang's illness panting, head pain, eyes not clear.

sentences.zh: 臣意心論之，以為非病也。

translations.literal: Minister Yi internally discussed it, considered it not illness.

sentences.zh: 以為肥而蓄精，身體不得搖，骨肉不相任，故喘，不當醫治。

translations.literal: Considered it obesity yet storing essence, body not able to move, bones and flesh not mutually supporting, therefore panting, should not be medically treated.

sentences.zh: 脈法曰『年二十脈氣當趨，年三十當疾步，年四十當安坐，年五十當安臥，年六十已上氣當大董』。

translations.literal: Mai fa say "year twenty mai qi dang qu, year thirty dang ji bu, year forty dang an zuo, year fifty dang an wo, year sixty yi shang qi dang da dong".
translations.idiomatic: Pulse method says "age twenty pulse energy should hasten, age thirty should quick step, age forty should peacefully sit, age fifty should peacefully lie, age sixty and above energy should greatly move".

sentences.zh: 文王年未滿二十，方脈氣之趨也而徐之，不應天道四時。

translations.literal: Wen Wang's age not yet full twenty, just at pulse energy should hasten yet slow it, not responding to heaven way four seasons.

sentences.zh: 後聞醫灸之即篤，此論病之過也。

translations.literal: Later heard physician moxa burned him then serious, this discusses illness's excess.

sentences.zh: 臣意論之，以為神氣爭而邪氣入，非年少所能復之也，以故死。

translations.literal: Minister Yi discussed it, considered it spirit energy contending yet evil energy entered, not young age able to restore it, therefore died.

sentences.zh: 所謂氣者，當調飲食，擇晏日，車步廣志，以適筋骨肉血脈，以瀉氣。

translations.literal: What is called energy, should regulate eating drinking, choose leisurely days, carriage walking broaden will, to relax muscles bones flesh blood vessels, to drain energy.

sentences.zh: 故年二十，是謂『易眢』。

translations.literal: Therefore year twenty, this speak "yi dang".
translations.idiomatic: Therefore age twenty, this is called 'easy storage.'

sentences.zh: 法不當砭灸，砭灸至氣逐。」

translations.literal: Fa not dang bian jiu, bian jiu reach qi zhu."
translations.idiomatic: Method not proper needle moxa, needle moxa causes energy to expel."

sentences.zh: 問臣意：「師慶安受之？

translations.literal: Ask minister Yi: "Shi Qing an shou it?
translations.idiomatic: Asked Minister Yi: "Shi Qing received it from whom?

sentences.zh: 聞於齊諸侯不？」

translations.literal: Hear yu Qi zhu hou not?"
translations.idiomatic: Heard from Qi feudal lords not?"

sentences.zh: 對曰：「不知慶所師受。

translations.literal: Dui said: "Not know Qing suo shi shou.
translations.idiomatic: Answered: "Do not know Qing's teacher received from.

sentences.zh: 慶家富，善為醫，不肯為人治病，當以此故不聞。

translations.literal: Qing's family rich, good at medicine, unwilling to treat people's illnesses, probably for this reason not heard.

sentences.zh: 慶又告臣意曰：『慎毋令我子孫知若學我方也。』」

translations.literal: Qing again tell minister Yi said: "Shen wu ling wo zi sun know ruo xue wo fang.""
translations.idiomatic: Qing moreover told Minister Yi: 'Carefully do not let my descendants know you studied my formulas.'"

sentences.zh: 問臣意：「師慶何見於意而愛意，欲悉教意方？」

translations.literal: Ask minister Yi: "Shi Qing he see yu Yi yet ai Yi, yu all jiao Yi fang?"
translations.idiomatic: Asked Minister Yi: "Shi Qing what saw in Yi yet loved Yi, wanted to completely teach Yi formulas?"

sentences.zh: 對曰：「臣意不聞師慶為方善也。

translations.literal: Dui said: "Minister Yi not hear shi Qing become fang shan.
translations.idiomatic: Answered: "Minister Yi did not hear Shi Qing good at formulas.

sentences.zh: 意所以知慶者，意少時好諸方事，臣意試其方，皆多驗，精良。

translations.literal: The reason Yi knew Qing was Yi young time liked various formula matters, Minister Yi tested his formulas, all many verified, refined good.

sentences.zh: 臣意聞菑川唐裏公孫光善為古傳方，臣意即往謁之。

translations.literal: Minister Yi heard Zichuan Tangli Gongsun Guang good at ancient transmitted formulas, Minister Yi then went to visit him.

sentences.zh: 得見事之，受方化陰陽及傳語法，臣意悉受書之。

translations.literal: Got to see and serve him, received formula transformed yin yang and transmitted secret methods, Minister Yi all received and wrote them.

sentences.zh: 臣意欲盡受他精方，公孫光曰：『吾方盡矣，不為愛公所。

translations.literal: Minister Yi yu jin shou he jing fang, Gong sun Guang said: "Wu fang jin, not become ai gong suo.
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi wanted to completely receive other refined formulas, Gongsun Guang said: "My formulas exhausted, not for loving you withhold.

sentences.zh: 吾身已衰，無所復事之。

translations.literal: My body already declined, nothing more to serve.

sentences.zh: 是吾年少所受妙方也，悉與公，毋以教人。』

translations.literal: This wu year shao suo shou miao fang, all with gong, wu with jiao ren."
translations.idiomatic: These are my young age received marvelous formulas, all give to you, do not teach people."

sentences.zh: 臣意曰：『得見事侍公前，悉得禁方，幸甚。

translations.literal: Minister Yi said: "Get see shi shi gong qian, all get jin fang, xing very.
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi said: "Got to see and serve before you, all received forbidden formulas, fortunate very.

sentences.zh: 意死不敢妄傳人。』

translations.literal: Yi die not gan wang chuan ren."
translations.idiomatic: Yi die dare not recklessly transmit to people."

sentences.zh: 居有閒，公孫光閒處，臣意深論方，見言百世為之精也。

translations.literal: Resided with leisure, Gongsun Guang idle place, Minister Yi deeply discussed formulas, saw speech hundred generations make them refined.

sentences.zh: 師光喜曰：『公必為國工。

translations.literal: Shi Guang xi said: "Gong must become guo gong.
translations.idiomatic: Teacher Guang happily said: "You must become state craftsman.

sentences.zh: 吾有所善者皆疏，同產處臨菑，善為方，吾不若，其方甚奇，非世之所聞也。

translations.literal: My good ones all distant, same birth place Linzi, good at formulas, I not equal, his formulas very strange, not world heard.

sentences.zh: 吾年中時，嘗欲受其方，楊中倩不肯，曰「若非其人也」。

translations.literal: Wu nian zhong shi, chang yu shou its fang, Yang Zhong Qian not ken, said "ruo not its person".
translations.idiomatic: My middle years, once wanted to receive his formulas, Yang Zhongqian unwilling, said "you not that person".

sentences.zh: 胥與公往見之，當知公喜方也。

translations.literal: Together with you go see him, should know you love formulas.

sentences.zh: 其人亦老矣，其家給富。』

translations.literal: Its person yi lao, its home ji fu."
translations.idiomatic: That person also old, his family sufficient rich."

sentences.zh: 時者未往，會慶子男殷來獻馬，因師光奏馬王所，意以故得與殷善。

translations.literal: At the time not yet gone, met Qing's son Yin come present horses, because Teacher Guang presented horses to king place, Yi therefore got with Yin good.

sentences.zh: 光又屬意於殷曰：『意好數，公必謹遇之，其人聖儒。』

translations.literal: Guang again shu Yi yu Yin said: "Yi hao shu, gong must jin yu it, its person sheng ru."
translations.idiomatic: Guang moreover entrusted Yi to Yin: "Yi loves numbers, you must carefully treat him, that person sage confucian."

sentences.zh: 即為書以意屬陽慶，以故知慶。

translations.literal: Then made letter with Yi entrusted Yang Qing, therefore knew Qing.

sentences.zh: 臣意事慶謹，以故愛意也。」

translations.literal: Minister Yi shi Qing jin, with gu ai Yi."
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi served Qing carefully, therefore Qing loved Yi."

sentences.zh: 問臣意曰：「吏民嘗有事學意方，及畢盡得意方不？

translations.literal: Ask minister Yi said: "Li min chang have shi xue Yi fang, and bi jin de Yi fang not?
translations.idiomatic: Asked Minister Yi: "Officials people ever had matters study Yi formulas, and completely exhausted got Yi formulas not?

sentences.zh: 何縣里人？」

translations.literal: He xian li ren?"
translations.idiomatic: What county quarter person?"

sentences.zh: 對曰：「臨菑人宋邑。

translations.literal: Dui said: "Lin Zi ren Song Yi.
translations.idiomatic: Answered: "Linzi person Song Yi.

sentences.zh: 邑學，臣意教以五診，歲餘。

translations.literal: Yi studied, Minister Yi taught with five diagnoses, year remaining.

sentences.zh: 濟北王遣太醫高期、王禹學，臣意教以經脈高下及奇絡結，當論俞所居，及氣當上下出入邪［正］逆順，以宜鑱石，定砭灸處，歲餘。

translations.literal: Jibei King sent imperial physician Gao Qi, Wang Yu study, Minister Yi taught with classic vessels high low and strange network knots, should discuss transport points location, and energy should up down exit enter evil correct reverse normal, to appropriate needle stones, determine needle moxa places, year remaining.

sentences.zh: 菑川王時遣太倉馬長馮信正方，臣意教以案法逆順，論藥法，定五味及和齊湯法。

translations.literal: Zichuan King time sent imperial granary horse director Feng Xin correct formulas, Minister Yi taught with pressing method reverse normal, discuss medicine method, determine five flavors and harmonize preparation decoction method.

sentences.zh: 高永侯家丞杜信，喜脈，來學，臣意教以上下經脈五診，二歲餘。

translations.literal: Gaoyong Marquis house overseer Du Xin, loved pulses, came study, Minister Yi taught with upper lower classic vessels five diagnoses, two years remaining.

sentences.zh: 臨菑召裏唐安來學，臣意教以五診上下經脈，奇咳，四時應陰陽重，未成，除為齊王侍醫。」

translations.literal: Lin Zi zhao li Tang An come xue, minister Yi jiao with wu zhen shang xia jing mai, qi gai, four shi ying yin yang zhong, not cheng, chu become Qi wang shi yi."
translations.idiomatic: Linzi Zhao quarter Tang An came study, Minister Yi taught with five diagnoses upper lower classic vessels, strange cough, four seasons respond yin yang heavy, not completed, appointed as Qi king attendant physician."

sentences.zh: 問臣意：「診病決死生，能全無失乎？」

translations.literal: Ask minister Yi: "Zhen illness jue death life, able quan no shi hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Asked Minister Yi: "Diagnose illness decide death life, able completely no loss not?"

sentences.zh: 臣意對曰：「意治病人，必先切其脈，乃治之。

translations.literal: Minister Yi dui said: "Yi zhi illness person, must xian cut its pulse, then zhi it.
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi answered: "Yi treats ill people, must first cut their pulse, then treat them.

sentences.zh: 敗逆者不可治，其順者乃治之。

translations.literal: Declining reverse ones cannot treat, the smooth ones then treat them.

sentences.zh: 心不精脈，所期死生視可治，時時失之，臣意不能全也。」

translations.literal: Xin not jing mai, suo qi death life shi able zhi, shi shi shi it, minister Yi not able quan."
translations.idiomatic: Heart not refined pulse, what period death life consider can treat, sometimes lose it, Minister Yi cannot complete."

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：女無美惡，居宮見妒；

translations.literal: Tai shi gong said: nu no mei e, ju gong see du;
translations.idiomatic: Grand Scribe said: Woman no beautiful ugly, reside palace see jealousy;

sentences.zh: 士無賢不肖，入朝見疑。

translations.literal: Scholar no worthy unworthy, enter court see suspicion.

sentences.zh: 故扁鵲以其伎見殃，倉公乃匿跡自隱而當刑。

translations.literal: Therefore Bian Que with his skill saw calamity, Cang Gong then hid traces self concealed yet suffered punishment.

sentences.zh: 緹縈通尺牘，父得以後寧。

translations.literal: Ti Ying presented bamboo slip, father thereby afterward peaceful.

sentences.zh: 故老子曰「美好者不祥之器」，豈謂扁鵲等邪？

translations.literal: Therefore Lao Zi said "mei hao person not xiang zhi qi", qi speak Bian Que deng xie?
translations.idiomatic: Therefore Laozi said "beautiful good ones inauspicious vessels", how speak Bian Que and such?

sentences.zh: 若倉公者，可謂近之矣。

translations.literal: Like Cang Gong, can be said near it.
